text: Lee Soon-ja (Hangul: 이순자, Hanja: 李順子) (born 24 March 1939) is the widow of South Korean President Chun Doo-hwan. She was the first lady when Chun Doo- hwan was in office, from 1980 to 1988.June 30, 2009 ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:First Ladies of South Korea
title: Lee Soon-ja
